name: Elbit Systems Ltd.
description: Elbit Systems Ltd. is a leading international defense electronics company engaged in a wide range of defense and commercial programs. Founded in 1966 and headquartered in Haifa, Israel, Elbit Systems designs, develops, and supplies advanced systems and solutions for military, homeland security, and commercial applications. The company's diverse portfolio includes unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs), electro-optics, command and control systems, intelligence, surveillance and reconnaissance (ISR) capabilities, and various advanced weapon systems. Elbit Systems aims to provide high-quality and innovative solutions to enhance the operational capabilities of armed forces and security agencies around the world. The company has a strong focus on research and development, continuously investing in new technologies and solutions to meet the evolving needs of its customers in the defense sector. With operations in over 50 countries, Elbit Systems is recognized for its commitment to excellence and its ability to deliver complex projects efficiently. The company also emphasizes collaboration with local industries and government entities, fostering partnerships that enhance regional defense capabilities. Elbit Systems' mission is to ensure the security and well-being of nations by providing state-of-the-art defense solutions while promoting technological advancements in the field.
